reviewText: I'm a fan of Takeru Sato & I like most of his work. This is a goofy show to watch with just the right amount of drama added in. The only downside was the english subs kind of broke down towards the end of the series. Other than that I liked it.
loved the story and cried a little bit and laughed. i found it by accident, i'm into korean movies a lot!!!!
My daughter is an African American and obsessed with Asian culture. She watches Korean dramas faithful but she dislike this one. She couldn't get into the storyline and the subs made matters worse.
